title: Apex Legends™: July 2023 Ranked Dev AMA
short_desc: Catch-up on the dev team’s Ranked AMA on r/ApexLegends from July 21, 2023.

title: New Updates Coming With Apex Legends™: Resurrection
short_desc: Get a glimpse into game updates coming in Apex Legends™: Resurrection including Revenant reborn, Charge Rifle changes, and more!

title: Glow for Show in the Neon Network Collection Event
short_desc: Shine a neon light on a shady plot as a tech-savvy assassin in the Neon Network Collection Event.

title: Apex Legends™: July 2023 Ranked Dev Blog
short_desc: Learn more about Ranked on Apex Legends™, what we’ve learned so far with Arsenal updates, and a peek at what’s to come.

title: Strike with Style in the Dressed to Kill Collection Event
short_desc: Drop into Armed and Dangerous for a limited-time and prove your prowess with shotguns and snipers.

title: Global Price Adjustment Update
short_desc: An update on the upcoming global price adjustments for Apex Legends.

title: Prove you’re the greatest danger of all in the Threat Level Event
short_desc: One fan-voted mode will be available all event long, alongside cosmetic bundles, a new LTM in the Mixtape rotation, and more!

title: Apex Legends™: Arsenal Patch Notes
short_desc: Delve into the full patch notes for Arsenal including new legend Ballistic, Weapon Mastery, and updates to the Ping System.

title: Arsenal LTM Community Vote
short_desc: Vote for which mode you think should get a dedicated playlist in our upcoming in-game event!

title: Apex Legends™: Arsenal Ranked Update
short_desc: Learn more about Ranked on Apex Legends and what recent changes we’ve made to improve on our Ranked and matchmaking systems

title: New Updates Coming with Apex Legends™: Arsenal
short_desc: Dig deeper into new game updates coming in Apex Legends: Arsenal including a World’s Edge Map Update, Weapon Mastery, Firing Range Map Update and more!

title: No mask can hide a Legend long in the Veiled Collection Event
short_desc: Reveal yourself a Champion among Legends in the new limited-time mode - TDM Unshielded Deadeye, a new map for Team Deathmatch, and more!

title: Time to catch and fire some rays in the Sun Squad Collection Event
short_desc: See if you handle the heat in a new limited-time mode Heatwave and check out Ash’s “Strongest Link” Heirloom

title: Don a Guardian’s Armor in the Imperial Guard Collection Event
short_desc: Protect your fellow Legends while playing the rotating modes in Mixtape and unlock Wraith’s “Hope’s Dawn” Heirloom!

title: Celebrate 4 years of Apex Legends with the Anniversary Collection Event
short_desc: Celebrate our 4th Anniversary and play to earn cosmetics with a new community-created reward track and more!

title: Revelry Patch Notes
short_desc: Get ready for Remastered Legend Classes, Team Deathmatch, a new Weapon, and more when Revelry launches on February 14th.

title: New Updates Coming with Apex Legends: Revelry
short_desc: Dig deeper into game updates and new features coming in Apex Legends: Revelry season including Remastered Legend classes, Team Deathmatch, and more!

title: Learn about Apex Legends™: Revelry
short_desc: Apex Legends Game Director and Design Director give a sneak preview of the next season in this special dev diary.

title: Apex Legends: Eclipse Patch Notes
short_desc: Explore a new map, conjure your inner strength with Catalyst, a new defensive Legend, and show your generosity with the new Gifting feature!

title: Reforged Kings Canyon Map Update
short_desc: Explore the reforged Kings Canyon. What was once Skull Town has risen from the ashes as Relic.

title: Choose your side, mechs or monsters, in the Awakening Collection Event
short_desc: Control mode returns, check out Lifeline’s Town Takeover, patch notes, and more for the Awakening Collection Event launching on June 21.

title: Apex Legends Mobile Cold Snap Patch Notes
short_desc: Stay Frosty Legends—welcome to Cold Snap!

title: Apex Legends Mobile Prime Time Patch Notes
short_desc: The wait is over legends. Welcome to Apex Legends Mobile.

title: Saviors Patch Notes
short_desc: Leap into the line of fire with a new Legend, Newcastle, traverse a monstrous map update, learn about Ranked Reloaded, and more!

title: Apex Legends: Defiance Patch Notes
short_desc: Check out the full patch notes of what to expect this season including a new Legend, LTM, and more when Defiance launches on February 8th!

title: WATCH APEX LEGENDS | STORIES FROM THE OUTLANDS: “GRIDIRON”
short_desc: Watch the latest installment of the Stories from the Outlands: “Gridiron”

title: Apex Legends: Escape Patch Notes
short_desc: Check out the full patch notes of what to expect in the Escape update.

title: Evolution Collection Event Patch Notes
short_desc: Run and gun with a new Town Takeover, Rampart’s Heirloom, a new twist on Arenas, and tons more updates in the Evolution Collection Event.

title: Apex Legends: Emergence Patch Notes
short_desc: The Emergence update is a sight to behold. Get the full details in the patch notes.

title: The Planet Trembles in the World’s Edge Map Update
short_desc: After months of aggressive mining, World’s Edge is overmined, overburdened, and pushed to its limit. Learn more about our latest map update.

title: Announcing Ranked Arenas
short_desc: Get the details on what’s in store for Ranked Arenas when the Emergence update launches next month.

title: Enter a New Arena in the Thrillseekers Event
short_desc: Crank it up a notch with a new Arenas map, weekly rewards tracks, and splashy new looks when the Thrillseekers event begins on 7/13/21.
